# Donostia Award

| image_upright = 0.8
| awarded_for = To honor artists' achievements and contributions to cinema
| image_caption = The 2025 recipients: Jennifer Lawrence and Esther García
| country = Spain
| firstawarded = 1986
| presenter = San Sebastián International Film Festival
}}
The Donostia Award (; ) is an honorary award created in 1986 which is given every year to a number of actors and filmmakers in the San Sebastián International Film Festival. It derives its name from Donostia, the Basque name of San Sebastián.
